Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Production EHS Manager Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Implement and maintain appropriate safety programs e.g., Injury and Illness Prevention Programs, policies and procedures as necessary to ensure a safe & healthful work environment for all personnel and crew. Act as the designated management employee authorized and responsible to establish, administer and enforce a   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
